label: applicableGoodsCharacteristic
comment: A distinguishing material feature applicable to this trade product instance.
A goods characteristic applicable to this specified material.
A material goods characteristic applicable to this trade product.
Material goods characteristic applicable to this supply chain packaging.

rangeIncludes.comment: A distinctive feature of a material contained within physical goods.

domainIncludes.comment: An individual trade product or batch of similar trade products produced by human or mechanical effort or by a natural process.
A substance from which something is or could be made.
Any material with which supply chain goods are packaged, such as a box or bubble wrap.
Any tangible output or service produced by human or mechanical effort or by a natural process for trade purposes.
